summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 67th Street, from 34th Avenue Northwest to 35th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No.9867 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
